post.text: More people are voting in this election than ever before. Make a plan to vote today: hillaryclinton.com/makeaplan

comment.author: Amber
comment.text: Hillary es una criminal que nadamas quiere el poder. No me importa que sea mujer, porque es una mujer mentirosa. Ella no representa mis morales ni los de mi madre. Hillary is a criminal who only cares about obtaining power. I don't care if she is a woman, because she is a liar. She does not represent my morals or those of my mother. My Hispanic family is voting for Trump!!! üíï. #LatinosForTrump

replies.author: Olivia
replies.text: I have learned the first line in Spanish...and I will use it...Stay calm..It's going the right way...God bless...Greetings from Norway...üíñ‚òÉÔ∏è
